short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cast a spell to your pair-programming Zoom room!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
App for all CodeSmith juniors and seniors.

The wizard will look for your most recently assigned pair programming room mention on Slack #general. With one click, you will be teleported away to your pair-programming session.

The wizard will only remember up to the last time you opened Slack. Make sure to open #general each time you have a new assignment. You can find a one-button link to #general in the extension popup window.

Currently, the app defaults to FTRI 4, you may change your Slack organization URI under settings if you are in another cohort.

This is an open source project! https://github.com/miguelh72/codesmith-hackathon
